import { useState } from "react" import {Form, Row, Col, InputGroup, Container} from "react-bootstrap" import {roomName, roomType, validation} from "../Utils/validation" function CreateRoom(){ const [roomDetails, setRoomDetails] = useState({ roomName, roomType }) return<>

} export default CreateRoom
